document_data.caption: ''A pair of gnolls being hypnotized.''
document_data.name: Hypnotic Pattern
document_data.mainbody: '''''Hypnotic pattern''''' was an [[illusion]] spell that could incapacitate multiple creatures.
document_data.Effects: The spellcaster created a pattern of twisting colors that lasted for just a moment. Any creature within range that could see the pattern would be paralyzed for up to one minute, as long as the caster kept concentrating. Creatures could attempt to resist to this effect or be shaken out of it.
document_data.Components: The spell required [[Somatic component|somatic]] and material components. The required materials were either an [[incense]] stick or a crystal [[vial]] filled with some phosphorescent material.
document_data.History: The spell was attributed to [[Netherese arcanist]] [[Hamring]] in {{Yearlink|-1292}} and was originally called ''Hamring's hypnopattern''.
